attributes.comment:
The proposal to raise immigration and naturalization benefit application and
petition fees by an average of 66 percent will make an already expensive process
for adopting foreign children even more expensive for U.S. individuals and families.
It will add an additional, unnecessary financial burden to Americans who are
currently going through this time-consuming and costly process, and will serve to
discourage others from pursuing this vital endeavor. If a fee increase is absolutely
unavoidable, then a more modest one in line with the cost of inflation or slightly
above the cost of inflation would be less onerous. Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
